text:
@holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @edeandrea This is a great blog.

We used to ponder your point “tech t-shirts are only printed for men” when ordering swag for work events, and I’m not sure we usually got it right.

author.name: Peter Anghelides
author.description: It's pronounced /ˌændʒɨˈliːdɨs/ Now on Mastodon as @anghelides@mastodonapp.uk or https://t.co/Tm0DnhdEFd
